amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 453 related to the Limitation on use of funds for Designated Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 453.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 433).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
